summary: A simple clean makeover of Breezehome in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod of Breeze home I\'ve been working on for the past few days. 
I am new to creation kit  so I\'m sure it maybe in need of a few twinks ,
 if so please let me know and i will fix them ASAP!!  
I have moved the bedroom  so Lydia is no longer in your room  watching you sleep  ( CREEPY) 
added three mannequins 
two dagger display cases 
one more weapon rack slot by the front door 
moved and changed the cooking area 
opened and added an enchanting table and another personal chest in the alchemy area 
changed some decorations and furniture  
changed all the walls , loft floors and rugs 
and finally added more lighting  and cleaned up some junk
all weapon racks  mannequins and bookcases are empty
Must of the updates I did on this home are tied in with normal house upgrades you buy  so I do Recommend that you buy all house updates and move what-ever you have in the house out before installing this mod....  
 In all its feels more open and a much bigger house then it did before even tho it isn\'t . If you like it or have any wishes let me know and I will continue to update on this mod.  
ALSO ADD DO NOT FORGET TO ENDORSE ME SO I KNOW IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD 
--------------------------------------
UPDATE MARCH 31 2012  ver2.0
 DELETE OLD SIMPLE BREEZE DUE TO THE FOLLOWING CHANGES JUST TO SAFE

 mannequins are fixed  and one was moved to new wall
 total of 5 weapon racks now!!!
 added 1 storage barrel
 added 1 safe
 added 2 weapon plagues above the 2 dagger display cases
 dimmed the fireplace light
 tested with Freeroam Housecarls by reggert
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11551
 
++++ notes+++++

      act like any other house update , removed items from house
 and do a hard save.Also delete old esp before installing new one 

  Everything is working perfect on my end  if something  
  is bugging it may be do to other add-ons I don\'t run

  You DO NOT NEED THE BREEZEHOME LADDER MOD !!!!

  If mannequins still seem out of place simply leave the house  
 Ext / restart the game \" seemed to work out perfect on my end \"
author: Menacereborn
